languages.text: {n}В сгрудившейся вокруг стола компании Джай выделяется роскошью наряда и сверкающим аугментом. Завидев вас, она заявляет:{/n} "Пусть гравитационные колодцы ваших миров не скудеют хваткой притяжения так же, как сердце мое не скудеет радостью при виде Вольного Торговца фон Валанциус".

{n}You easily spot Jae in the group crowded around the table — the extravagant luxury of her attire and her gleaming augment set her apart from the rest. Seeing you, she exclaims,{/n} "May the gravitational wells on your worlds never lack for grip, just as my heart never lacks for joy at the sight of Rogue Trader von Valancius."
languages.original_text: {n}В сгрудившейся вокруг стола компании Джай выделяется роскошью наряда и сверкающим аугментом. Завидев вас, она заявляет:{/n} "Пусть гравитационные колодцы ваших миров не скудеют хваткой притяжения так же, как сердце мое не скудеет радостью при виде Вольного Торговца фон Валанциус".

Seeing you, she exclaims,{/n} "May the gravitational wells on your worlds never lack for grip, just as my heart never lacks for joy at the sight of Rogue Trader von Valancius."

languages.text: {n}你一眼就从围在桌边的人群之中看到了婕伊。她穿着奢华的服饰，带着闪闪发光的植入物，看起来鹤立鸡群。她一见到你，便高呼起来。{/n}“愿你们的世界永远不会缺少引力，正如每当我见到冯·瓦兰修斯家族的行商浪人时，我的心中永远都不会缺少喜悦一样。”
languages.original_text: {n}You easily spot Jae in the group crowded around the table — the extravagant luxury of her attire and her gleaming augment set her apart from the rest. Seeing you, she exclaims,{/n} "May the gravitational wells on your worlds never lack for grip, just as my heart never lacks for joy at the sight of Rogue Trader von Valancius."

traits.locale_text: {n}你一眼就从围在桌边的人群之中看到了婕伊。她穿着奢华的服饰，带着闪闪发光的植入物，看起来鹤立鸡群。她一见到你，便高呼起来。{/n}“愿你们的世界永远不会缺少引力，正如每当我见到冯·瓦兰修斯家族的行商浪人时，我的心中永远都不会缺少喜悦一样。”

languages.text: {n}テーブルを囲む一群の中から、あなたはすぐにジェイを見つけた。豪華絢爛な服装と輝くオーグメティックが、彼女を他とは一線を画している。あなたを見て、彼女は叫ぶ{/n}「あんたの惑星の重力の井戸が、決してその枷をなくさんことを。自由開拓者、フォン・ヴァランシウスを見れば、私の心は歓びに跳ね上がる」
languages.original_text: {n}You easily spot Jae in the group crowded around the table — the extravagant luxury of her attire and her gleaming augment set her apart from the rest. Seeing you, she exclaims,{/n} "May the gravitational wells on your worlds never lack for grip, just as my heart never lacks for joy at the sight of Rogue Trader von Valancius."

traits.locale_text: {n}テーブルを囲む一群の中から、あなたはすぐにジェイを見つけた。豪華絢爛な服装と輝くオーグメティックが、彼女を他とは一線を画している。あなたを見て、彼女は叫ぶ{/n}「あんたの惑星の重力の井戸が、決してその枷をなくさんことを。自由開拓者、フォン・ヴァランシウスを見れば、私の心は歓びに跳ね上がる」

languages.text: {n}Pronto ves a Jae en el grupo reunido en torno a la mesa. El lujo extravagante de sus ropajes y su aumento brillante la diferencian de los demás. Al verte, exclama:{/n} «Que los pozos gravitatorios de sus mundos nunca pierdan su potencia, igual que mi corazón no pierde la alegría al ver a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente von Valancius».
languages.original_text: {n}You easily spot Jae in the group crowded around the table — the extravagant luxury of her attire and her gleaming augment set her apart from the rest. Seeing you, she exclaims,{/n} "May the gravitational wells on your worlds never lack for grip, just as my heart never lacks for joy at the sight of Rogue Trader von Valancius."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pronto ves a Jae en el grupo reunido en torno a la mesa. El lujo extravagante de sus ropajes y su aumento brillante la diferencian de los demás. Al verte, exclama:{/n} «Que los pozos gravitatorios de sus mundos nunca pierdan su potencia, igual que mi corazón no pierde la alegría al ver a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente von Valancius».

languages.text: {n}C'est sans le moindre mal que vous repérez Jae au milieu du groupe amassé autour de la table ; le luxe extravagant de sa tenue et son augmentation rutilante la font nettement sortir du lot. En vous apercevant, elle s'exclame :{/n} « Puissent les puits gravitationnels de vos mondes ne jamais manquer d'emprise, à l'image de mon cœur qui ne manque jamais de joie à la vue {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} von Valancius »
languages.original_text: {n}You easily spot Jae in the group crowded around the table — the extravagant luxury of her attire and her gleaming augment set her apart from the rest. Seeing you, she exclaims,{/n} "May the gravitational wells on your worlds never lack for grip, just as my heart never lacks for joy at the sight of Rogue Trader von Valancius."

traits.locale_text: {n}C'est sans le moindre mal que vous repérez Jae au milieu du groupe amassé autour de la table ; le luxe extravagant de sa tenue et son augmentation rutilante la font nettement sortir du lot. En vous apercevant, elle s'exclame :{/n} « Puissent les puits gravitationnels de vos mondes ne jamais manquer d'emprise, à l'image de mon cœur qui ne manque jamais de joie à la vue {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} von Valancius »

languages.text: {n}Leicht machst du Jae in der Gruppe aus, die um den Tisch gedrängt steht – mit ihrer extravaganten Kleidung und ihrer schimmernden Augmentation hebt sie sich von den anderen ab. Als sie dich sieht, ruft sie aus:{/n} "Mögen die Gravitationsquellen auf Euren Welten nie versiegen, so wie die Freude in meinem Herzen beim Anblick des {mf|Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} von Valancius nie versiegt."
languages.original_text: {n}You easily spot Jae in the group crowded around the table — the extravagant luxury of her attire and her gleaming augment set her apart from the rest. Seeing you, she exclaims,{/n} "May the gravitational wells on your worlds never lack for grip, just as my heart never lacks for joy at the sight of Rogue Trader von Valancius."

traits.locale_text: {n}Leicht machst du Jae in der Gruppe aus, die um den Tisch gedrängt steht – mit ihrer extravaganten Kleidung und ihrer schimmernden Augmentation hebt sie sich von den anderen ab. Als sie dich sieht, ruft sie aus:{/n} "Mögen die Gravitationsquellen auf Euren Welten nie versiegen, so wie die Freude in meinem Herzen beim Anblick des {mf|Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} von Valancius nie versiegt."

languages.text: {n}Masanın etrafına toplanmış grubun arasında Jae'ı kolaylıkla seçebiliyorsun. Son derece şatafatlı, lüks kıyafeti ve ışıl ışıl parlayan ogmenti, onu diğerlerinden ayırıyor. Seni görünce heyecanla sesleniyor.{/n} "Dünyalarındaki çekim kuyularının tutuşu asla azalmasın. Tıpkı Hür Tacir von Valancius'u her gördüğümde kalbimde beliren neşenin asla azalmayacağı gibi."
languages.original_text: {n}You easily spot Jae in the group crowded around the table — the extravagant luxury of her attire and her gleaming augment set her apart from the rest. Seeing you, she exclaims,{/n} "May the gravitational wells on your worlds never lack for grip, just as my heart never lacks for joy at the sight of Rogue Trader von Valancius."

traits.locale_text: {n}Masanın etrafına toplanmış grubun arasında Jae'ı kolaylıkla seçebiliyorsun. Son derece şatafatlı, lüks kıyafeti ve ışıl ışıl parlayan ogmenti onu diğerlerinden ayırıyor. Seni görünce heyecanla sesleniyor:{/n} "Dünyalarındaki çekim kuyularının tutuşu asla azalmasın. Tıpkı Hür Tacir von Valancius'u her gördüğümde kalbimde ortaya çıkan neşenin asla azalmayacağı gibi."
